languages.text: {n}Иссохшее лицо поворачивается к вам. Его губы трепещут в радостном предвкушении.{/n} "Завет Паутины вновь ведет нас стезей священной войны. Незримый доныне враг, истязавший душу судна, явил себя. Клинки мои вновь ножны покинули — кровью выродков напиться долг их зовет".

{n}His shrivelled face turns to you. His lips quiver in joyous anticipation.{/n} "Once again, the Tenets of the Web lead us along the thread of righteous struggle. The foe, the flagship's tormentor, until now unseen, has shown its face at last. My blades have left their sheaths, and duty commands them to slake their thirst with monstrous blood."
languages.original_text: {n}Иссохшее лицо поворачивается к вам. Его губы трепещут в радостном предвкушении.{/n} "Завет Паутины вновь ведет нас стезей священной войны. Незримый доныне враг, истязавший душу судна, явил себя. Клинки мои вновь ножны покинули — кровью выродков напиться долг их зовет".

traits.locale_text: {n}A shrivelled face turns toward you. Its lips quiver in joyous anticipation.{/n} "Ahn'shini once again leads us on the path of righteous struggle. The previously unseen foe that tormented the vessel's soul has finally revealed itself. My blade has left its sheath, and duty calls to slake its thirst with the anathemas' blood."

languages.text: {n}Su rostro marchito se gira hacia ti. Sus labios tiemblan por anticipación.{/n} «Una vez más, la Doctrina de la Red nos guía por el hilo de la recta lucha. El enemigo oculto que atormenta la nave insignia por fin ha revelado su rostro. Mis hojas han salido de sus vainas y me corresponde saciar su sed con la sangre de esos monstruos».
languages.original_text: {n}His shrivelled face turns to you. His lips quiver in joyous anticipation.{/n} "Once again, the Tenets of the Web lead us along the thread of righteous struggle. The foe, the flagship's tormentor, until now unseen, has shown its face at last. My blades have left their sheaths, and duty commands them to slake their thirst with monstrous blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su rostro marchito se gira hacia ti. Sus labios tiemblan por anticipación.{/n} «Una vez más, la Doctrina de la Red nos guía por el hilo de la recta lucha. El enemigo oculto que atormenta la nave insignia por fin ha revelado su rostro. Mis hojas han salido de sus vainas y me corresponde saciar su sed con la sangre de esos monstruos».

languages.text: {n}男の肩に埋まった顔がこちらを向く。その唇は喜びに震えている。{/n}「またもや、ウェブの教義が正義の闘いの糸へと導いてくれた。今まで見えなかった旗艦を苦しめる敵が、ついにその姿を現した。私の刃は鞘から抜かれて、誓いが恐ろしい血で渇きを癒せと命じている」
languages.original_text: {n}His shrivelled face turns to you. His lips quiver in joyous anticipation.{/n} "Once again, the Tenets of the Web lead us along the thread of righteous struggle. The foe, the flagship's tormentor, until now unseen, has shown its face at last. My blades have left their sheaths, and duty commands them to slake their thirst with monstrous blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}男の肩に埋まった顔がこちらを向く。その唇は喜びに震えている。{/n}「またもや、ウェブの教義が正義の闘いの糸へと導いてくれた。今まで見えなかった旗艦を苦しめる敵が、ついにその姿を現した。私の刃は鞘から抜かれて、誓いが恐ろしい血で渇きを癒せと命じている」

languages.text: {n}他将干瘪的脸转向你，嘴唇颤抖着，充满了喜悦与期待。{/n}“织血罗网的教义再次带领我们踏上了正义之战的道路。我们的敌人，旗舰的祸害，终于显现出了它的面容，不再躲躲藏藏。我的利刃已经离鞘，渴望履行职责，用怪物的鲜血来满足饥渴。”
languages.original_text: {n}His shrivelled face turns to you. His lips quiver in joyous anticipation.{/n} "Once again, the Tenets of the Web lead us along the thread of righteous struggle. The foe, the flagship's tormentor, until now unseen, has shown its face at last. My blades have left their sheaths, and duty commands them to slake their thirst with monstrous blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}他将干瘪的脸转向你，嘴唇颤抖着，充满了喜悦与期待。{/n}“织血罗网的教义再次带领我们踏上了正义之战的道路。我们的敌人，旗舰的祸害，终于显现出了它的面容，不再躲躲藏藏。我的利刃已经离鞘，渴望履行职责，用怪物的鲜血来满足饥渴。”

languages.text: {n}Er wendet sein runzeliges Gesicht dir zu. Seine Lippen beben vor freudiger Erwartung.{/n} "Erneut führen uns die Grundsätze des Netzes auf den Pfad des rechtschaffenen Kampfes. Der Feind, der Peiniger des Flaggschiffs, bisher unsichtbar, hat endlich sein Gesicht gezeigt. Meine Klingen haben ihre Scheiden verlassen, und die Pflicht gebietet ihnen, ihren Durst mit monströsem Blut zu stillen."
languages.original_text: {n}His shrivelled face turns to you. His lips quiver in joyous anticipation.{/n} "Once again, the Tenets of the Web lead us along the thread of righteous struggle. The foe, the flagship's tormentor, until now unseen, has shown its face at last. My blades have left their sheaths, and duty commands them to slake their thirst with monstrous blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er wendet sein runzeliges Gesicht dir zu. Seine Lippen beben vor freudiger Erwartung.{/n} "Erneut führen uns die Grundsätze des Netes auf den Pfad des rechtschaffenen Kampfes. Der Feind, der Peiniger des Flaggschiffs, bisher unsichtbar, hat endlich sein Gesicht gezeigt. Meine Klingen haben ihre Scheiden verlassen, und die Pflicht gebietet ihnen, ihren Durst mit monströsem Blut zu stillen."

languages.text: {n}Il tourne son visage ratatiné vers vous, les lèvres tremblantes d'anticipation.{/n} « Une fois encore, les Préceptes de la Toile nous guident sur le fil du juste combat. L'ennemi, le tourmenteur du vaisseau amiral, jusque-là invisible, s'est enfin dévoilé. Mes lames ont quitté leur fourreau, et le devoir leur commande d'étancher leur soif avec le sang monstrueux. »
languages.original_text: {n}His shrivelled face turns to you. His lips quiver in joyous anticipation.{/n} "Once again, the Tenets of the Web lead us along the thread of righteous struggle. The foe, the flagship's tormentor, until now unseen, has shown its face at last. My blades have left their sheaths, and duty commands them to slake their thirst with monstrous blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il tourne son visage ratatiné vers vous, les lèvres tremblantes d'anticipation.{/n} « Une fois encore, les Préceptes de la Toile nous guident sur le fil du juste combat. L'ennemi, le tourmenteur du vaisseau amiral, jusque-là invisible, s'est enfin dévoilé. Mes lames ont quitté leur fourreau, et le devoir leur commande d'étancher leur soif avec le sang monstrueux. »

languages.text: {n}Buruşuk yüzü sana dönüyor. Dudaklarında neşeli bir beklenti beliriyor.{/n} "Ağ'ın İlkeleri, erdemli bir mücadelenin ipliğinde bize bir kez daha yol gösteriyor. Sancak gemisinin şimdiye dek gözlere görünmemiş işkenceci düşmanı, en nihayetinde yüzünü gösterdi. Kılıçlarım kınlarından ayrıldı. Vazifem, susuzluklarını ardı arkası kesilmeden akıtılan kanla gidermemi emrediyor."
languages.original_text: {n}His shrivelled face turns to you. His lips quiver in joyous anticipation.{/n} "Once again, the Tenets of the Web lead us along the thread of righteous struggle. The foe, the flagship's tormentor, until now unseen, has shown its face at last. My blades have left their sheaths, and duty commands them to slake their thirst with monstrous blood."
